suite.name: 04 HomePage

kw.name: When Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: And Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Then wait until page contains element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Comment
kw.doc: Displays the given messages in the log file as keyword arguments.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of element identified by `locator`.
kw.msg: ${element_text} = Login | Signup Become Gold Member Make a Gift!

kw.name: Get Line
kw.doc: Returns the specified line from the given ``string``.

kw.name: Comment
kw.doc: Displays the given messages in the log file as keyword arguments.

arguments.arg: Login with valid credentials or Logout and Login with valid cr-ls(when system save any legitim cr-ls)

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Then click link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by locator.

kw.name: Then wait until page contains element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Then input text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Then input password
kw.doc: Types the given password into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Then unselect checkbox
kw.doc: Removes selection of checkbox identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Then click Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

arguments.arg: Logout and Login with valid cr-ls
